text: Prince of Foxes is a 1949 American adventure movie directed by Henry King and based on the 1947 novel of the same name by Samuel Shellabarger. It stars Tyrone Power, Orson Welles, Wanda Hendrix, Marina Berti, and Everett Sloane and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1950. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s historical movies Category:1949 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry King Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the 15th century Category:Movies set in the 16th century Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Prince of Foxes (movie)
